question: The expenditure incurred by the Divisional Officers on behalf of Cabinet Secretariat or/and Ministry of Defence will be booked under the
option_a: Suspense head 8658 -Suspense Accounts- 107-Cash Settlement Suspense Account
option_b: Suspense head 8658 -Suspense Accounts- 129-Material Settlement Suspense Account

option_d: Contractor-Advance payment under the functional major head

question: Pick the incorrect one
option_a: A claim for reimbursement of the monthly expenditure will be made by the Division against the Accounts Officer of the Cabinet Secretariat or the Ministry of Defence, as the case may be, duly supported by an attested copy of the Schedule of Works Expenditure (without any supporting vouchers) in Form CPWA 64.
option_b: The Accounts Officer concerned will settle the claim within one fortnight of receipt of claims on the basis of this.

option_a: Schemes of all the Ministries/Department including Non-Civil Departments
option_b: Schemes of all the Non-Civil Departments

option_d: all schemes of Non-Government and Private Agencies

question: Pick the correct one regarding scheme of Authorisation
option_a: The functional Department with the approval of its FA/CCA/CA, issues an Administrative Approval and Financial Sanction.

question: Pick the correct one
option_a: At the close of financial year, the Principal Accounts Officer of the Agent Department would record a certificate to the effect that the progressive figures of expenditure, as shown in the statement of expenditure for the month of March/March Supplementary under the respective unit of appropriation, have been duly reconciled with the Statement of Central Transactions.
option_b: The PAO of the functional Ministry/Department while preparing Annual Appropriation Accounts of its Ministry/Department would take into account the progressive figures of expenditure as reported to him by the PAO of the Agent Department for the month of March/March Supplementary.

question: Pick the incorrect one
option_a: At no stage, the Agent Department shall exceed the Budget allocations indicated by the functional Ministry/Department.
option_b: If an excess is anticipated, the Agent Department shall incur the expenditure and raise a claim with functional Ministry/Department for reimbursement by booking the expenditure under MWA
option_c: If an excess is anticipated, the Agent Department shall immediately bring the matter to the notice of the Functional Ministry/Department and request them for more allocation or further instructions.
option_d: Copies of such letters shall be endorsed to the Chief Controller of accounts/Controller of accounts of the Agent Department, who shall ensure that no excess drawals are made.
